pullRequest.body:
We introduce a universal property for the automorphism group of a fiber functor for any topological group. In the further development of the Galois categories API, an arbitrary topological group satisfying this universal property shall be used in the place of `Aut F`, to prepare for later usages of this API in the case of e.g. `G` being the absolute Galois group of a field `k` and `F` being the fiber functor of the category of finite, étale `k`-algebras.

---

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

- [x] depends on: #16668

`+ toAut_surjective_of_isPretransitive`

Thanks!

bors merge
Thanks for the review!
Is there some issue with bors? It has been saying "Pending - Waiting in queue" since 8 hours and clicking on details gives "Internal server error". Maybe it needs another `bors r+`?

Ah, this may have fallen off the queue when bors crashed.
bors r+

In case something else happens again
bors d+

:v: chrisflav can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10930937657/job/30344910493)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10930937657/job/30344910678)

```suggestion
/-- To check equality of natural transformations `F ⟶ F`, it suffices to check it on
```
It seems to me this could be generalized to natural transformations from `F` to any functor `G`, with the same proof.
Indeed, this works. Changed.

```suggestion
variable {C : Type u₁} [Category.{u₂} C] (F : C ⥤ FintypeCat.{w})
```
Could you extract a lemma `toAut_injective_of_non_trivial` similarly as for the surjectivity?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory/Galois): universal property of fundamental group
